casebody.data:
NOONSOB
v.
STATE of NC 131P16-9 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Somchoi Noonsab, for Noonsab, Somchoi. Somchoi Noorsob, for Noorsob, Somchoi.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of May 2018 by Defendant for Verified Complaint:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of June 2018."
